pchtae ga laine wala b coz bhut km resolution hai just 1080 or 401 ppi or video recording just 30fps wah 60fps to bhut set de rhe is se kahin cheap rates pr or battery bhi km hai 6.4 inch screen k lihaz se na hi finger print hai one week k andar hi is ka rate lakh se neeche aa jae ga,,quality itnii ghtiyaa ha iski biknaa hi nii ha flop mobile

Ghaus bhai ye qeemat k lehaz se history ka flop tareen mobile hony wala hai aur price 145000 se kum shaed hee ho ye unho neymar se commercial krwany k pese b lene hen na aur baqi s9+ mein pyare bhai 256 gb b hai aap ki mrzi hai jonsa marzi lyn sirf camera specs kehne k itbar se achhi hen gpu aur glass k ilawa har cheez s9+ se kum hai jub k s9+ mene 125000 ka lya hai ...is mobile k sb sy ghtiya revioews bntty hain
